page.title: 06EDUCATION
page.content: PRIMARY SCHOOL. There is only one school in East Hanney and that is East Hanney Primary school. Pupils range in age from 5 to 11years old.Children from both the Hanneys, Charney Bassett and Denchworth come to the school. BUILDING. The school buiding dates from about 1842 although some parts are more modern. The school is built in stone. There is a hard playground at the front of the school and a large playing field behind the school. CLASSES. The school has four classes: Class 1 9-11 years, Class 2 7-9 years, Class 3 6-7 years, Class 4 5-6 years. EQUIPMENT. The school is well equipped with its own pool, computer, television & video.
